name: Ugby Mumba 3
description:
Originally made for Pixel Day 2021 on Newgrounds!

Run and gun with Mumba on his quest to rescue his girlfriend and his eggs from the clutches of evil!

This game features six full levels with six unique boss fights, eight unlockable hats for Mumba, and  a whole bunch of other good stuff! PLAY IT IN YOUR BROWSER FOR FREE!

Default controls are just your arrow keys for moving, Z for jumping, and X for shooting. These controls can be rebound from the options menu.

If you like the game and want to support us, consider purchasing the supporter bundle! It comes with the game's source code, concept art, and soundtrack!
